EmailTemplate.description: this iMeet template introduces the new DVR feature in iMeet
EmailTemplate.name: iMeet DVR
EmailTemplate.subject: Record you iMeet meetings with just one click
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INTRODUCING iMEET DVR RECORD MEETINGS WITH JUST ONE CLICK
We're excited to let you know that your iMeet room just got a lot better. Now, you can record your entire meeting with the click of a button using the new DVR capability. Your recording includes all of the cubes, presentations, public chats and public notes.
When your meeting is over, your file link and all of the notes associated with your meeting will automatically be emailed to you, ready to share.
Go to the iMeet community to learn more about all of the new features available now with iMeet. Or host a meeting to see them live!
Questions? Contact me now. I'm happy to answer questions or set up a demo.
Regards, [{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}] [{!User.Email}] [{!User.Phone}]
